remarks: The transitive predecessors form the smallest class transitive in ` R ` and ` A ` .  That is, if ` B ` is another ` R ` , ` A ` transitive class containing ` Pred ( R , A , X ) ` , then ` TrPred ( R , A , X ) C_ B ` (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Apr-2012.)
